name_japanese: 코코몽3
description: The third season of Cocomong.

name_japanese: コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュ DVDマガジン
description: Short episodes included in the "Code Geass DVD Magazine".

name_japanese: コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュ 仮面告白大会 第1週来場者特典 ピクチャードラマ
description: A picture drama bonus included in a special DVD given to all who purchased a ticket for the film Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch I - Koudou over the course of the first six weeks of airing.

name_japanese: 珈琲いかがでしょう
description:
The anime follows a coffee food truck shop, where the barista makes an individual cup for each customer. The coffee brewed conscientiously, sincerely, and wholeheartedly helps customers unwind.

(Source: ANN)

name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー
description: Tumulus Gal Coffy goes to Tumulus High School, where a barrow tomb from the Yayoi period, the royal successor of the tumulus world, a grave from America, a commander from the Sengoku period as a teacher, and various other tumuli gather. Enjoy the tumuli love, friendship, and youth depicted in a cemetery school love comedy.

name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー
description: The TV adaptation of the ONA series. Unlike the ONA, which has 10 episodes, this series has 11 episodes.

name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー
description: Cofun Gal no Coffy (TV) DVD specials. The official website lists these episodes as various "pilots".

name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー クリスマス大作戦
description: A DVD special of Cofun Gal no Coffy (TV) for the Limited Edition Box Set only, chronologically it is episode 10.

name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー　キャンパスライフ
description: The sequel to Cofun Gal no Coffy (TV), it takes place 3 year later via a college campus life comedy about 20-year-old college student Coffy, her boyfriend Nintoku-kun, her childhood friend Daniel, her love rival Dorothy, and Okehazama-sensei, who quit being a teacher and became the chief of the college mart.

name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー　キャンパスライフ
description: Specials included on the DVD release of the Cofun Gal no Coffy Campus Life series.

name_japanese: 「古墳ギャルのコフィー キャンパスライフ」～イントロ～
description: An introduction web episode to Cofun Gal no Coffy Campus Life while also covering the main cast and characters of the previous season. This episode was also included in Cofun Gal no Coffy Campus Life's DVD release.

name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー ～コフンデレラ～
description: The Frogman Company presents, a Tumulus Cinderella Story! Once upon a time, a gentle girl named Coffy lived a life of misery, being treated like trash by her sister-by-law Daniel and her family. Coffy was not allowed to go to the dance party where Prince Charles would choose his bride, but...

name_english: Tumulus Gal Coffy the 12 Angry Tumuli
name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー ～１２人の怒れる古墳達～
description: Coffy and Daniel were practicing the Japanese lion dance for their exhibit in the school festival, when Abukuma-san started yelling at them for being so loud. Coffy's temper snaps, and she hurls his beloved bonsai at him. Daniel becomes convicted for damaging property. What will become of the trial?

name_english: Tumulus Gal Coffy The Battle of Okehazama
name_japanese: 古墳ギャルのコフィー　～桶狭間の戦い～
description: Coffy, Daniel, and Okehazama-sensei accidentally entered the Forbidden Room behind the school building of Tumulus High School. When they managed to get out, they realized they had slipped back in time! Why did Okehazama-sensei become a fallen soldier? The truth behind the famous Japanese historical event, the Battle of Okehazama, is revealed!

name_japanese: こぎみゅん
description:
The series centers on the flour dough spirit Cogimyun, who actually really wants to be an onigiri. She takes care of her grandfather's apartment complex due to her grandfather being away. The denizens of the apartment are all "Kogimuko," which are all food that center on flour dough. 

(Source: ANN)

name_japanese: Collapse Zen
description: Short animation by Kojirou Shishido featuring various grey structures crumbling apart.

name_japanese: コロンブスの大冒険
description:
As he nears the New World, Christopher Columbus tells cabin boy Paco about his youthful hardships, the difficulties of convincing others of his vision, and the final victory when King Ferdinand and Queen Isabella agreed to sponsor his trip. The sailors are doubtful, though Columbus is vindicated when they arrive on land, but it's not as the planned destination of Japan.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

name_japanese: Compiler Music Clips in Trackdown
description: Based on the Compiler manga series by Kia Asamiya.

name_japanese: こんぷれっくす×コンプレックス
description:
The story follows the protagonist girl Yui Kotani, a second-year junior high school student who is obsessed with men's underarm hair, and the relationship with her male classmate Masato Takeo who has the thickest underarm hair in the class.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

name_japanese: コンドームバトラー ゴロー
description:
The show follows Gorou, a 24-year-old man who dreams of becoming the greatest Condom Battler. His go-to weapon is a 0.01 mm condom which he loads into an arm dispenser, and it opens to reveal a red rubbery armor that Gorou wears in battle. It also gives the hero the ability to summon sperm and created an attack out of the sticky substance.

There are other characters in the anime like Miku and Hayato who duel using their own condoms. The anime is filled with absurd dialogue and fights, but these heroes always make sure to teach a sex education lesson along the way. 

(Source: Comicbook.com)

name_japanese: 聪明的一休之反斗公主
description: A Chinese film version of the original Japanese Ikkyuu-san anime.

name_japanese: Controller of Controller
description: A video game character finds a VR headset on the street.

name_japanese: こんびに戦記　プリンタイ
description: A series of shorts for the HP FamilyMart chain.

name_japanese: クッキングパパ クリスマススペシャル
description: Special of Cooking Papa.

name_japanese: コピー
description: Music video for the song Copy by the band Kaisoku Tokyo for their first album "Music Station."

name_japanese: コラルの探検
description:
Hector the Rat teams up with his fellow denizens of Pretty Wood, including the titular Coral (a young girl) and the unimaginatively named Crow (a crow), to head off to Holland. With many musical scenes, the voice actors were chosen for their singing ability above all considerations.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

name_japanese: ころころコロニャ
description: Corocoro Coronya is a cat who loves to roll (corocoro) and spends a lot of his time in a cornet. San-X released this character with goods, LINE stickers, and merchandise in 2017 though its public debut was in 2016.

name_japanese: 「宇宙」予告編アニメ映像
description: Animated trailer for Chronicle's song Cosmos.

name_japanese: countdown
description:
"I would make my new animation with my New Year's cards, and my New Year's cards with my new animation."

(Source: Maya Yonesho)

name_japanese: CP
description: Official music video for the chef cooks me's song CP for their album Feeling that was released on October 2, 2019.

name_japanese: crack
description: An abstract short animation by Densuke28, Junnosuke Hara, and Koki Matsumoto.

name_japanese: クレヨンの星
description: An educational film about a teamwork. A group of crayons get a message that they can meet with the a king star if they have great values. Bickering ensues and they have to work together to prove their worth to meet the king.

name_japanese: 映画クレヨンしんちゃん 激突! ラクガキングダムとほぼ四人の勇者
description: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name_japanese: Crystal Sea Ver.69 [Kay Nakayama Remix]
description: Music video directed by Mitsuyuki Ishibashi for Crystal Sea Ver. 69 by Intelligent Jazz, a collaborative project formed by Kay Nakayama with drummer Akira Jimbo.

name_japanese: Cup of Smoke
description: Music video for the remixed version of Cup of Smoke by Your Gay Thoughts & Alphabets Heaven from the album "The Watercolors Remixed."

name_japanese: カレーの国のコバ～ル
description:
Coburoux is a prince of Curry Kingdom. Although he is a prince, he goes to the school for common people, and he is treated like other students. In fact, he is scolded by the teacher, is made to stand during class as a punishment, go some errands for a chef, and is teased by a girl whom he loves. He is always worried, and wonders whether the prince should be better. Being surrounded by weird friends and strange people in Curry Kingdom, he spends worrying days.

(Source: AnimeNfo)

name_japanese: カレーといえば
description: Music video directed by Takaharu Shimizu for the title track of the single Curry to Ieba by Japanese band Saboten Takamizu Haruna.

name_japanese: きゅーと研究会
description: Music video for the song Cute Kenkyuukai by Otogivanashi (おとぎ話) from their 2015 album "Culture Club." Directed by Necony Cobain.

name_japanese: サイボーグ009 THE CYBORG SOLDIER 黄泉の群像
description: A recap episode of Cyborg 009: The Cyborg Soldier that aired between episode 47 and 48.

name_japanese: サイボットロボッチ
description:
Apparently inspired largely by Akira Toriyama's popular Dr. Slump, Cybot Robocchi is the story of Robocchi, a fun-loving, mischievous robot with a TV set in his stomach.

Robocchi lives in a peaceful village with various other robots, all created by the eccentric and somewhat lecherous Dr. Art Deko. Although he is an android, Robocchi has a warm, kind heart and is always willing to help out a friend in need. With his human girlfriend Kurumi, he gets into a variety of wacky adventures.

(Source: Wikipedia)

name_japanese: 大王不高兴2
description: Second season of Da Wang Bu Gaoxing.

name_japanese: 大卫贝肯之倒霉特工熊
description:
A Chinese adaptation of the international Backkom franchise. This film serves as a prequel to the main show.

With the human exploitation of natural resources, the Arctic environment is completely destroyed, leaving only the last polar bear to survive. A human girl named Jessica adopts the polar bear and names him Backkom. Jessica is an extraordinary agent of the Security Department. Backkom eager to become an agent someday, but he is so clumsy that he can only do the cleaning in the Security Department.

All of a sudden, a mysterious organization of polar bears shows up, places bombs around the world, and claims to seek revenge from human race. To remove threat of bombs, the top decision-making body of men, Global League, decides to arrange agents going under the basement of the Polar Bear Organization. While there are human detectors placed in the basement, their mission failed. Leaving the Global League with no choice, they have to train Backkom into an agent and arrange him to the Polar Bear Basement. Jessica is so concerned about Backkom and follows him in secret.

Backkom and Jessica encounter so many difficulties in the basement, while they all succeed in solving them. They remove the bomb threat eventually, but Backkom was caught by the organization, where they show him a shocking fact. In the same time, the Global League is concerning giving up on Backkom, and launches attack to the Polar Bear Organization. 

(Source: Wikipedia)

name_japanese: 大嘴巴嘟嘟
description: Considered a shanzhai version of Crayon Shin-chan. Dudu is a kindergartner who gets in to lots of trouble while making frequent butt/fart jokes. Most episodes revolve around him and his friends that usually end with a recap half-heartedly attempting a moral lesson to be taught.

name_japanese: 大话之少年游
description:
Rookie Jianghu and swordsman Xiao Yao Sheng have defeated the baby-eater that caused Chang'an, but they now find themselves falling into a bigger mystery. They traveled to the distant Spirit Beast Village and met the beautiful Demon Fox Girl, the Bone Elves, and people of all kinds inhabiting rivers and lakes along the way. They gained growth and friendship, but are now entangled in a greater crisis: a dispute between immortals and demons. The animation will combine elements such as martial arts, fantasy, blood, adventure, and more, to present to the audience a tale of ups and downs in legendary stories!

(Source: V2Anime)

name_japanese: 大护法
description:
A warrior named Da Hufa goes to save his prince from a dystopian village. He finds the dystopian village ruled by a fake God and his guards. In order to save the prince, Da hufa has to defeat the God and his men and discloses the whole conspiracy.

(Source: IMBD)

name_japanese: 第13回インディーズアニメフェスタOP
description: An original opening animation by Takashi Taniguchi for the 13th Indie Anime Festa, held in Mitaka, Tokyo.
